description: Detects the shell open key manipulation (exefile and ms-settings) used for persistence and the pattern of UAC Bypass using fodhelper.exe, computerdefaults.exe, slui.exe via registry keys (e.g. UACMe 33 or 62)
name: Shell Open Registry Keys Manipulation
query: (((winlog.event_data.EventType:"SetValue" AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:*Classes\\ms\-settings\\shell\\open\\command\\SymbolicLinkValue AND winlog.event_data.Details:*\\Software\\Classes\\\{*) OR winlog.event_data.TargetObject:*Classes\\ms\-settings\\shell\\open\\command\\DelegateExecute) OR ((winlog.event_data.EventType:"SetValue" AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:(*Classes\\ms\-settings\\shell\\open\\command\\\(Default\) OR *Classes\\exefile\\shell\\open\\command\\\(Default\))) AND (NOT (winlog.event_data.Details:"\(Empty\)"))))
author: Christian Burkard
